subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mikhail Grabovski scored the opening goal, and Jaroslav Halak made 40 saves for his 26th win of the season as the Islanders dominated at a boisterous Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Mikhail Grabovski scored the opening goal, and Jaroslav Halak made 40 saves for his 26th win of the season as the Islanders dominated at a boisterous Nassau Coliseum.
